purpose: Facilitate the creation and management of AI agents using a Python SDK and command-line interface
principle: Built on LangChain and OpenAI technologies to enable language model interactions and tool calling
reusability: Offers a modular SDK and CLI tools for easy integration and extension of AI agent capabilities
limitations: Currently in alpha stage with potential stability issues and limited documentation
name: arcade-ai
highlight: Arcade Python SDK and CLI for building and orchestrating AI agents
